artist: Artist: Andy Baird; Artist: Gerard Bonnette; Artist: James DeWitt; Artist: Frank Gaard; Artist: Michael Haiduck; Artist: Jim Hobern; Artist: David Johnson; Artist: Ed Rath; Artist: John Rath; Artist: Jan Richard; Artist: Joan Rothfuss; Artist: Fritz Wolfmeyer; Artist: Chris Woodward; Publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 14 pages, various papers, saddle-stapled, one leaf inserted; b/w printed covers; on front cover man at left holding dice in PL hand and looking into Black Star Match box; man at right has hands raised and is wearing trench coat and hat
inscription:
Inscription

at bottom of front cover, handwritten in pencil: John Ittman | at bottom of page 7 handwritten in black ink: For Mr. Ittman artistic proof 1977 Frank Gaard
provenance: MIA Art Reference and Research Library; transfered to MIA, 2015.
title: Artpolice Newsletter, Vol. 3, No.2
